mainText:
hello

Steve wherever you are reborn-because rebirth is a must for you as "an
inventor par excellence",
the earth needs you to be reborn as an inventor to provide us mortals again
another example
of how to fight odds and yet live every day like there is no tomorrow,
inventing, reinventing and creating
gadgets that makes life of mankind so easy-not realising the tragedy the
inventor went thru all along

May your Soul Reinvent again.
author: Yeshwanth
